name: CreateContactConversation
description:
Create a conversation initiated by a contact.

This tool creates a conversation that has been initiated by a contact, which can be a user or a lead. It supports in-app messages and can handle visitors by converting them to contacts with a lead role. Use this tool to initiate communication with contacts effectively.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use for the request. Accepted values are '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: conversation_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the contact's role, ID, and message content. Example: {"from": {"type": "lead", "id": "123"}, "body": "Hello!"}. The role can be 'lead', 'user', or 'contact'.

type.description: The role associated to the contact - user or lead.

id.description: The identifier for the contact which is given by Intercom.

body.description: The content of the message. HTML is not supported.
